readable.title: 3203453897_6317aac6ff
readable.content: A man and a toddler look at advertisements . A man and child in front of a billboard A man in a black coat and hat and a child with a red snowsuit and Pooh backpacker read advertisements near a McDonalds . A man stands on a street corner with a small child looking at a sign . There is a man with a young child in a red outfit looking at advertisements .
